key_talking_points: Penalty on Aaron Ekblad of the Florida Panthers for holding the stick of Taylor Frederic. Edmonton will go on the power play with 17:06 remaining in the first period.
The Oilers will look to capitalize on this power play opportunity to tie the game. Florida has been disciplined so far but Ekblad's penalty gives Edmonton a crucial chance.
